# Load Tidyverse
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```
# Import data file
```{r}
height_data <- read.csv("height_data_clean.csv") # Import file
summary(height_data) # View structure, contents, and dimensions of data file
```
# Data Analysis
```{r}
height_data %>% 
  filter(survey_date == "2023-01-27") %>% # Retain data only from January 27, 2023
  group_by(pop) %>% # Group values by population
  summarise(average_height_cm = mean(height_cm)) # Calculate average height for each population
```
